name: A Light in the Dark (itch) (Fatal Error Game Studios)
name_original: A Light in the Dark (itch) (Fatal Error Game Studios)
description:
// Welcome to A Light In The Dark //

A horror shooter in which there is only one light source. Use your lantern to navigate the woods to escape the terrors that now roam the night following the disappearance of the Moon.

Controls ( PC ) 

Movement = WASD  
Aim = Mouse Look 
Fire = Left Mouse
Aim Down Sights = Right Mouse 
Pick Up/ Throw Lantern = Space
Pick Up / Drop Lantern = E
Sprint Toggle = Left Shift

Controls (Game Pad)

Movement = Left Analogue Stick  
Aim = Right Analogue Stick
Fire = Right Trigger
Aim Down Sights = Left Trigger
Pick Up/ Throw Lantern = Left Bumper
Pick Up / Drop Lantern = Left face action button (X / Square)
Sprint Toggle = Left Analogue Stick Click

Main Menu:
Navigate = WS
Confirm = Enter
Cancel = Esc
